coding_practice.title: Longest Uncommon Subsequence II
coding_practice.description:
Given an array of strings strs, return the length of the longest uncommon subsequence between them. If the longest uncommon subsequence does not exist, return -1.

An uncommon subsequence between an array of strings is a string that is a subsequence of one string but not the others.

A subsequence of a string s is a string that can be obtained after deleting any number of characters from s.

For example, "abc" is a subsequence of "aebdc" because you can delete the underlined characters in "aebdc" to get "abc". Other subsequences of "aebdc" include "aebdc", "aeb", and "" (empty string).
coding_practice.constraints:
2 <= strs.length <= 50
1 <= strs[i].length <= 10
strs[i] consists of lowercase English letters.
coding_practice.explanation:
1. 將 strs 按字串長度降序排序，優先檢查長字串。
2. 對每個字串 s，檢查其是否為其他字串的子序列。
3. 若 s 不是任何其他字串的子序列，則 s 是不常見的子序列，直接返回其長度。
4. 若遍歷所有字串都找不到不常見的子序列，返回 -1。
5. is_subsequence 函數使用迭代器檢查 s 是否為 t 的子序列。
